Text: Make Tax Day More RewardingsbomcgisimfHTML Dear Ms Corman Make Tax Day More Rewarding Maybe you cant avoid paying taxes But you can make it quick and easy and earn Membership RewardsR points Just use the American ExpressR Card to pay your individual federal income tax by phone or online and if youre enrolled in the Membership Rewards program you will earn one point for virtually every eligible dollar you charge Heres all you have to do File your individual federal tax return Form by paper or electronically Use your American Express Card to make your payment by phone or online Official Payments Corporation PAYTAX Click Here americanexpresssbctcgisimd Thats it Paying taxes has never been so easy or convenient You can also use the Card to pay federal estimated taxes Form ES or when requesting an extension to file your federal tax return Form And you may be eligible to pay state income taxes as well Simply visit americanexpresssbctcgisimd to see if your state is a participant So use the American Express Card and get something out of paying your taxes this year All federal and state tax payments made with the Card are subject to a convenience fee by Official Payments Corporation Click here for complete terms and conditions pcconvjspWebLogicSessionPHOKOCAcnfK americanexpresssbctcgisimd To earn points you must be enrolled in the Membership Rewards program at the time of your charge and you must charge your tax payment on an eligible enrolled American Express Card PS This email was sent to NRONCOM If you received this email at a different address this email message was forwarded If you do not wish to receive future email offers from American Express please hit the reply button and let us know by typing the word REMOVE and indicate this email
